description:
A BGM pack that includes music from GUST titles.
BGM can be changed from the diary on the desk in Ryza's room or from the desk in her atelier.

[Content]
 - Atelier Lulua
 - BLUE REFLECTION
 - Nights of Azure
 - Nights of Azure 2
 - Ciel Nosurge
 - Ar Nosurge
 - AUGMENTED REALITY GIRLS TRINARY

Note: This product is included in the Season Pass.  Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
name: GUST Extra BGM Pack
